results.name: Riordan array (1/(1+4x+x^2), x/(1+4x+x^2)).
comment: Row sums are (-1)^n*F(2n+2). Diagonal sums are (-1)^n*4^n. Inverse is A052179.
The positive matrix is (1/(1-4x+x^2), x/(1-4x+x^2)) with general term T(n,k) = if(k<=n, Gegenbauer_C(n-k,k+1,2),0).
Triangle of coefficients of Chebyshev's S(n,x-4) polynomials (exponents of x in increasing order). - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 22 2012
Subtriangle of triangle given by (0, -4, 1/4, -1/4, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, ...) DELTA (1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, ...) where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938. - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 22 2012
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n=0..100 of triangle, flattened
